entry.name: Operational Test Products
entry.description: operational product being tested by customer, full operational support

entry.name: Research Products
entry.description: product under development or supporting research, limited production support

entry.name: THORPEX Interactive Grand Global Ensemble (TIGGE) test
Pre-operational
entry.description: software has workday production support on a not-to-interfere-with-ops basis, hardware has 24/7 operational support

entry.name: Not in production at present
entry.description: Not being produced, though it has been produced in the past.

entry.name: Transition Products
entry.description: limited production support as resources allow

entry.name: Pseudo-operational Products
entry.description: workday production support on a not-to-interfere-with-ops basis
